name: Saguaro's Dream
description:
Survive a perilous journey through the desert as a majestic saguaro cactus. Defend yourself from animals trying to nibble on you and flap your way through the air to achieve your dream! Featuring:

  • Chill music to relax to.
  • Several birds!
  • A majestic soaring cactus!
  • A relaxing sunset.

Have fun, and flap those cactus arms!
